page.title: 08ALL SAINTS EAST MEON
page.content: Main Services:Holy Communion 8:00a.m., Parish Communion 10.15am. Average attendance 40. Other major services: Harvest, Remembrance Sunday, Christingle, Christmas Midnight Mass, Easter morning (attendance 100+). Electoral Roll 80. Parish population 1000. Large area, mostly unpopulated. Reverend Peter Wadsworth - Age 32 - appointed vicar 1984. Also Vicar of Langrish and Ecumenical Officer, Portsmouth Diocese (East Hampshire/Isle of Wight).Main areas of work. Service priparation; baptisms(8), weddings(4), funerals(15) per annum. Chaplain Bordean House (old people and cancer patients), Ramsdean House (old people). Visiting school. Maintenance of building (major fund raising). General pastoral work. Study. Ministry candidate training.House groups.
